author: Alex Puncekar
description:
There were moments during The Tainted Cup by Robert Jackson Bennett—author of The Divine Cities trilogy and the Founders trilogy—where I lost track of time and discovered the day had ended, and the only thing I did that day was read this book. A whirlwind of a mystery novel set in a fraught fantasy world, […]

The post REVIEW: The Tainted Cup by Robert Jackson Bennett appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: The Tainted Cup by Robert Jackson Bennett
